headline: Constellation Brands CEO says the Modelo maker is feeling the squeeze from softer economy, fewer drinkers
summary: A soft economy, labor shortages, and changing drinking habits are weighing on sales, Constellation Brands CEO Bill Newlands says.

raw.headline: Constellation Brands CEO says the Modelo maker is feeling the squeeze from softer economy, fewer drinkers
raw.summary: A soft economy, labor shortages, and changing drinking habits are weighing on sales, Constellation Brands CEO Bill Newlands says.

headline: Constellation Brands CEO is 'confident' despite declining sales
summary: Between the Trump administration's immigration policy changes, tariffs, weakening consumer confidence, and changing attitudes around alcohol, Constellation Brands (STZ) is caught in the crossfire of a multitude of headwinds that are weighing on the beer maker's sales. Constellation Brands CEO Bill Newlands joins Opening Bid with Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi to discuss what's driving the decline in the Corona and Modelo parent company's sales and his expectations going forward. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Constellation Brands (STZ) Margin Surge Challenges Doubts After Years of Weak Earnings
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) reported a jump in net profit margins to 12.7% this year, up from 5.7% last year, and delivered annual EPS growth of 111%, a turnaround from its five-year average earnings decline of 11% per year. While a significant one-off loss of $441.8 million affected the latest reported results, investors will likely take note of forecasts for earnings to grow another 12.63% per year, even if that pace lags the broader US market's 15.4% earnings growth average. The recent...

headline: Jim Cramer on Constellation Brands: “The Company Has Fallen Out of Grace”
summary: Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) is one of the stocks in Jim Cramer’s game plan for this week.
